CustomField.formula: IF( DiscountLevel__c = 0, (IMAGE('https://imgur.com/byT4CEi.png',"",30,150)), IF( DiscountLevel__c = 1, (IMAGE('https://imgur.com/byT4CEi.png',"",30,150)), IF( DiscountLevel__c = 2, (IMAGE('https://imgur.com/SsyZQbJ.png',"",30,150)), IF( DiscountLevel__c = 3, (IMAGE('https://imgur.com/PB5uR1F.png',"",30,150)), ""))))
CustomField.label: Discount Indicator
